pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.stats: HP: 45, Attack: 49, Defense: 49, Sp. Atk, 65, Sp. Def: 65, Speed: 45
pokemon.entry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plan sprouts and grows with this Pokemon. It can go for days without eating a single morse. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy. The bulb-like pouch on its back grows larger as it ages. The pouch is filled with numerous seeds

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.stats: HP: 60, Attack: 62, Defense: 63, Sp. Atk: 80, Sp. Def: 80, Speed: 60
pokemon.entry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.The bulb grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom. The bud on its back apparently draws energy from its body. The bud is said to open into a large flower when fully grown.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.stats: HP: 80, Attack: 82, Defense: 83, Sp. Atk. 83, Sp. Def: 100, Speed: 80
pokemon.entry: The flower on its back blooms when it is absorbing solar energ, which is then absorbed and used for energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight. Once it's catching the sun's rays, it often remains quiet and still.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.stats: HP: 39, Attack: 52, Defense: 43, Sp. Atk: 60, Sp. Def: 50, Speed: 65
pokemon.entry: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail. The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places. Even the newborns have flaming tails Unfamiliar with fire, babies are said to accidentally burn themselves.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.stats: HP: 58, Attack: 64, Defense: 58, Sp. Atk: 80, Sp. Def: 65, Speed: 80
pokemon.entry: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels. Tough fights could excite this Pokemon. When excited, it may blow out bluish-white flames. It appears to be very vicioius. It attacks with razor-sharp claws and won't stop until the enemy is defeated.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.stats: HP: 78, Attack: 84, Defense: 78, Sp. Atk: 109, Sp. Def: 85, Speed: 100
pokemon.entry: Its fiery breath reaches incredible temperatures. It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders and can quickly melt glaciers weighing 10,000 tons. When expelling a blast of super hot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.  Charizard is known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.stats: HP: 44, Attack: 48, Defense: 65, Sp. Atk: 50, Sp. Def: 64, Speed: 43
pokemon.entry: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It takes time for the shell to form and harden after hatching. It powerfully sprays foam from its mout, shoots water at prey while in the water and withdraws its shell when in danger.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.stats: HP: 59, Attack: 63, Defense: 80, Sp. Atk: 65, Sp. Def: 80, Speed: 58
pokemon.entry: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance. When tapped, this Pokemon will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit. The tail is covered with a rich fur. It stores air in the fur before taking extended dives underwater.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.stats: HP: 79, Attack: 83, Defense: 100, Sp. Atk: 85, Sp. Def: 105, Speed: 78
pokemon.entry: A brutal Pokemon with pressurized water jets on its shell. It has spouts extending from its shell at the top, which is used for high speed tackles. They spray water like cannons, hard enough to pierce concrete walls. Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.
